name: CLARITY_EAP_5
description: The CLARITY_EAP_5 table contains basic information about the procedure records in your system. This includes both A/R and clinical procedures. This is a continuation of Clarity table CLARITY_EAP.

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the procedure record.

columns.name: MYC_TKT_OVR_RULE_ID
columns.description: Specify a rule to determine when to allow manually sending appointment requests to the patient for scheduling.
